title: W3C Web Bluetooth Community Group-relevant MDN issues
description: Issue filed on MDN Web Docs related to pages attached to technologies developed by W3C Web Bluetooth Community Group

items.content_html:
MDN URL

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/BluetoothDevice

What specific section or headline is this issue about?

Instance methods

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

The list of instance methods says that the method unwatchAdvertisements exists. Though looking through the specification it doesn't exist.

What did you expect to see?

I expect that only the methods that do exist are in the list of instance methods.

Do you have any supporting links, references, or citations?

The specification:
https://webbluetoothcg.github.io/web-bluetooth/#bluetoothdevice-interface

The code in chromium also doesn't define it:
https://github.com/chromium/chromium/blob/main/third_party/blink/renderer/modules/bluetooth/bluetooth_device.idl

Do you have anything more you want to share?

The forget() method is also missing.

MDN metadata

Page report details
  • Folder: en-us/web/api/bluetoothdevice
  • MDN URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/BluetoothDevice
  • GitHub URL: https://github.com/mdn/content/blob/main/files/en-us/web/api/bluetoothdevice/index.md
  • Last commit: 164d2b6
  • Document last modified: 2022-10-10T08:58:38.000Z
items.title: [web-bluetooth] `unwatchAdvertisements` isn't a function in the web bluetooth specification
